page.title: 11PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: In{Fulstow}there are two pubs called the{Cross Keys}and the{Lord Nelson}but the Lord Nelson is closed down.Mr.C. Brown owns the{Cross Keys}and Mr.G. Gebard owns the{Lord Nelson.}Mr. C. Browns sister and husband live with him. The pub is just opposite the shop by the cross roads.Mr.Brown employs Mrs. J. Jermain, Mr. A Webber, Mrs. C. Foxon and Mr.E.Parrot.The pub doesn't have a garden because there is no room for one. There is a slot machine and a darts board like every good pub should have.The pub also supplies food. The pub opens at 7.00pm and closes at 10.30pm except for celebrations like Christmas, New year, Bank holidays and Easter.It is a very pleasent pub with all the acceseries. The pub gets alot of custom from the people who go to do water-sports at the reservoir, Cyril has lots of locals as well!!
